DOC.brief_summary: Ticagrelor treatment is associated with increased rates of dyspnea, where previous studies have implied a possible role of adenosine. The purpose of this study is to determine if the caffeine-antagonist is effective in reducing dyspnea related to ticagrelor.
DOC.brief_title: Trial of Caffeine to Alleviate Dyspnea Related to Ticagrelor
